footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Welcome! Please check your email for verification.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage the application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Customize the application's color scheme (dark mode only). Values must be in HSL format.
heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover the path to your inner self and reconnect with your essence.
pastCeremoniesSubtitle: Moments of connection and transformation from our past encounters.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join us on a journey of healing and self-discovery. Find the date and place that resonates with you.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound and safe experience. Discover our recommendations to align your body, mind, and spirit.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks and stay connected. For more information, contact us directly.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details here. Click save when you're done.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the loving and experienced souls who will accompany you on your healing journey.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information. Upload a new photo or provide an image URL.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the guide from the page.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from two plants: the Ayahuasca vine and the Chacruna leaf. It is known for its profound healing and transformative properties, opening doors to deep self-awareness and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual level. It cleanses the body of toxins, helps release emotional blockages and limiting beliefs, and can provide deep insights into your life's purpose and your connection to the universe.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant, a spiritual guide that teaches with love and wisdom. Each ceremony is a unique and personal dialogue with this ancient teacher, offering what you need for your growth and healing.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of purpose and clarity about their life path.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release past traumas, fears, and anxieties in a safe and supportive space.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Deepen your connection with yourself, others, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the experience in a community setting, where the collective energy amplifies the healing. It's an opportunity to connect with others on a deep and authentic level.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, ideal for those seeking to work on specific issues with the full attention of the guide. Recommended for deep and focused work.
preparationPageTitle: Your Path to Transformation Begins Here
preparationProcessDescription: The journey starts weeks before, with a special diet and mental focus to purify your body and mind.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred night of introspection and healing, guided by experienced facilitators in a safe environment.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep dive into your consciousness, where you may receive visions, emotions, and profound revelations.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you understand and apply the lessons learned into your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: Cleansing your body is essential. We recommend following this diet for at least one week before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Lean meats like chicken or fish (in moderation)
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention is the compass of your journey. Take time to connect with yourself.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and be more receptive.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you want to heal or understand. What questions do you bring to the medicine?
reflectionDescription: Write about your feelings, fears, and hopes. It's a powerful tool for self-discovery.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. Trust the process and allow yourself to feel and release what no longer serves you. Our team is here to support you with love and compassion at every moment.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and profound night with these essential items.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, loose clothing (preferably white or light-colored)
Mattress or mat to lie on
essentialsList: Change of clothes for the morning
An open heart and a curious mind
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to access our preparation questionnaires and receive personalized guidance for your ceremony.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, soul on a journey. I am here to guide you with light and wisdom. How can I assist your spirit today?
chatbotError: I am having trouble processing your request right now. Please try again in a moment.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users and their roles.
allUsersDescription: Here you can see all registered users and manage their permissions.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations with the spiritual guide bot.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to see the full transcript.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety and well-being are our priority. Please answer these questions honestly so we can provide you with the best possible care.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication, especially for depression or anxiety (SSRIs, MAOIs)?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of severe mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you participated in an Ayahuasca ceremony or with other master plants before?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony? What are you seeking to heal, understand, or explore?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe your personal goals for this experience...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Thank you for completing the form. We will review your answers shortly.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'Yes'.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's submitted answers below.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted the questionnaire yet.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! This is an invitation from El Arte de Sanar. To prepare for your ceremony, please register (if you haven't already) and fill out our pre-ceremony questionnaire here: https://elartedesanarcr.com/questionnaire
tourWelcomeDescription: We are happy to have you here. To get started, please provide your phone number. This will help us stay in touch about your ceremony.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will only use this to contact you about the ceremonies.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see short videos from our past ceremonies. Feel the energy!
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: These are our next available dates. Find the one that resonates with you.
tourStepFinal: Great! The final step is to fill out our pre-ceremony questionnaire. This is very important for your safety. Let's go there now.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: Please provide a video URL or upload a file.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the past ceremonies carousel.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or provide a URL.
editHeroVideoDescription: Upload a new video or provide a URL for the hero section.
